hero_image.alt_text: Brandon sitting in front of American flag

biography.intro: Brandon Grebner is an American designer from Pittsburgh, PA.
biography.paragraph1: Brandon dropped out of college nine credits shy of a Bachelor's degree to become an entrepreneur. He started his first business with a $199 screen printing kit from eBay and a burned copy of Photoshop.
biography.quote: "I want to be an example of somebody who has no education, no funding, and can still start a business."
biography.paragraph2: With a ton of heart, it can work.

call_to_action.title: Ready to start your next project?
call_to_action.description: Let's create something amazing together. Reach out and let's discuss your vision.

blog_page.header_description: Thoughts on entrepreneurship, design, and building businesses without traditional credentials.
blog_page.newsletter_description: Get notified when I publish new insights on entrepreneurship and design.
